TopicTitle: Where can you be found elswhere on the internet?

Articles.Content:
So this is a thread to tell people where you can be found in the interwebs besides the KSP forums.

I am FishInferno on both Nasaspaceflight and The Rocketry Forum
Basically everywhere you need a username.
I'm Zucal on IRC, Reddit, and Twitch.
I can be found on many videogames under this name, but also steam(this name) and facebook,twitter,and lastly youtube(where I watch videos and subscribe to ksp people.
Reddit. That's pretty much it. Reddit and the KSP Forum ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

something like a half hundred of accounts and a half hundred of nicknames here, may be more ... e-user since 1999Ã‚Â® usually i don't like to be found by random people but any "skilled"\* user can easily or most simply by pm or else and ++ if affinities.

\*replace by the yin yang caracter of your choice ; ).
I'm Kerbalimgur on imgur, and Kerbalcrafts on KerbalX.
on steam im themaneman1 ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) you probably cant find me much elsware
I only use this username on the KSP forums. I'm Comrade Jenkens on every other account I have.

I have rolling user names sometimes, other times not so much. 

Also, I don't like doxing.

I am Hunting.Targ pretty much anywhere I am. Many, many MÃƒÂ¼ns ago I tried to choose a handle that would be unique; easy to recognize and unlikely to be copied. I succeeded, I think. I have never had to put a numerical prefix or suffix on it anywhere. And then I met the woman I married and found out she had done the same thing. Life is :0.0:some.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-08T05:43:38Z" title="05/08/2015 05:43  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 8, 2015</time> by Hunting.Targ**
  
bUggER. Can't quite get my sig right. \*sigh\*, will work on that. Bottom quote is from Obi-Wan in Episode IV

I generally use variations of Tw1, Changing capitalisation, adding more '1's, etc, in places of the internet I'm not accessing using my Facebook or Google acound. 

Probably the places I go most would be DeviantArt, Imgur, YouTube, and various webcomic coment sections. 

I also visit news sites (many of them satirical), science news sites, and occasionally various popular and not so popular blogs.
Pixel Papercraft (aka Minecraft Papercrafts) and Devianart. Otherwise the other Yukons you see are not me.

Every account of mine is called windows\_x\_seven.

***Every. Single. One.***
Steam, Twitter and Reddit. Mister Kingdom on Steam only, elsewhere I'm the Machman.

You can find me under ***Starwhip's Space Program*** on YouTube (Hopefully I'll have more than 2 videos soon! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)),and under ***Starwhip*** on Imgur (Tons of random uploads for KSP, but there's some cool stuff in there).
